body_html:
@flx42 Setting TF_CUDA_COMPUTE_CAPABILITIES before running configure should still work since that part of the configure script (showing the Cuda compute capabilities prompt only if TF_CUDA_COMPUTE_CAPABILITIES is not set) is still there: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/configure#L239

Running TF_CUDA_COMPUTE_CAPABILITIES=3.0,5.2 ./configure, then running a bazel build command, then looking at the compute capabilities generated in bazel-tensorflow/external/local_config_cuda/cuda/cuda_config.h confirms that the correct compute capabilities were set.

What is the issue that you are observing?
